CustomField.description: This field is optional and can be collected as part of a workflow. It represents the amount of the maximum tier balance that may be in the account in order to earn the disclosed rate for that tier. This is the high-end dollar amount for a given tier.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The amount of the maximum tier balance that may be in the account in order to earn the disclosed rate for that tier. This is the high end dollar amount for a given tier.
CustomField.label: Maximum Balance Tiered Account
